NEGF.NF: Well, I don't think that's quite right.
No, that's not the right answer.
No, that's not the correct answer.
No, you are on the wrong track.

NEUF.NUF: okay. but can you give me a little more on that?
Alright, but please give me a little more on this.
Kind of,but there is a little more you can add.
Yeah, but we need to try to cover a few more points
Almost there, Just give me a little more

Rule.name: Start
Rule.description: This is the beginning of the conversation.

Rule.name: Opening
Rule.description: This rule delivers the opening pack.

Rule.name: NoMoreTutoringPack
Rule.description: Turns to final closing when all tutoring packs have been covered.

Rule.name: StartTutoring
Rule.description: Turns to the main question of the new tutoring pack.

Rule.name: AskMQbyTutor
Rule.description: Ask the main question, assuming that there is always at least one main question prepared for the tutor agent.

Rule.name: FB2MQGood
Rule.description: User's answer is ideal. Give feedback and turn to final closing.

Rule.name: FB2MQBad1
Rule.description: User's answer is bad. Give feedback and get into expectation.

Rule.name: FB2MQMetaCog
Rule.description: User's answer is MetaCog, Give MetaCog repsonse and get into expectation.

Rule.name: PumpBlank
Rule.description: User's answer is blank, give a pump.

Rule.name: TryMQRepeat
Rule.description: User wants to repeat the question. Look for the second main question.

Rule.name: TryMQRepeat1
Rule.description: User wants to repeat the question. Look for the second main question.

Rule.name: TryMQRepeat2
Rule.description: User wants to repeat the question. Look for the second main question.

Rule.name: MQQADefGetAnswer
Rule.description: User's response is a definition question. Start question answering loop in main question

Rule.name: MQQADefHasAnswer
Rule.description: Answer user's definition question and continue.

Rule.name: MQQADefCantAnswer
Rule.description: No answer and continue.

Rule.name: MQQAGetAnswer
Rule.description: User's response is a question. Start question answering loop in main question

Rule.name: MQQAhasNoAnswer
Rule.description: User's response is a question but no answer available.

Rule.name: MQQAhasAnswer
Rule.description: User's response is a question. Start question answering loop in main question

Rule.name: CheckConfusionOne
Rule.description: Check confusion.

Rule.name: CheckConfusionTwo
Rule.description: Check confusion.

Rule.name: FB2MQConfusionOne
Rule.description: A UserConfused event is received from client.

Rule.name: FB2MQConfusionTwo
Rule.description: A UserConfused event is received from client.

Rule.name: FB2MQIrrelevant1
Rule.description: User's answer is irrelevant to the answer, give irrelevant feedback and get into expectation.

Rule.name: FB2MQIrrelevant2
Rule.description: User's answer is irrelevant to the answer, give irrelevant feedback and get into expectation.

Rule.name: PumpMQOtherwise
Rule.description: For all other situations, give a pump.

Rule.name: FB2RepeatMQGood
Rule.description: User's answer is good, turn to final closing.

Rule.name: FB2RepeatMQBad
Rule.description: User's answer is bad, get into expectations.

Rule.name: FB2RepeatMQOtherwise
Rule.description: Otherwise get into expectation.

Rule.name: FB2PumpGood
Rule.description: User's answer is ideal. Turn to final closing.

Rule.name: FB2PumpBad
Rule.description: User's answer is bad. Student agrees and gives a bad answer. Tutor corrects and get into expectation.

Rule.name: FB2PumpOtherise
Rule.description: All other cases, get into expectation.

Rule.name: NoMoreExpectation
Rule.description: When no more expectation available, turn to final closing.

Rule.name: StartExpectation
Rule.description: Try to find a hint when an expectation is available.

Rule.name: NoMoreHint1
Rule.description: Try to find prompt if there is no hint.

Rule.name: TutorHint
Rule.description: Deliver tutor hint.

Rule.name: FB2HintGood
Rule.description: User's answer is good to hint. Give feedback and turn to assertion.

Rule.name: FB2HintBadTutor
Rule.description: User's answer is bad to hint. Student agent agrees wrongly. Tutor agent corrects. Turn to prompt.

Rule.name: HintQADefGetAnswer
Rule.description: User's response is a definition question. Start question answering loop in main question

Rule.name: HintQADefHasAnswer
Rule.description: Answer user's definition question and continue.

Rule.name: HintQADefCantAnswer
Rule.description: No answer and continue.

Rule.name: HintQAGetAnswer
Rule.description: User's response is a question. Start question answering loop in main question

Rule.name: HintQAhasNoAnswer
Rule.description: User's response is a question but no answer available.

Rule.name: HingQAhasAnswer
Rule.description: User's response is a question. Start question answering loop in main question

Rule.name: FB2HintConfusion
Rule.description: User is confused. Give confusion feedback and turn to assertion.

Rule.name: CheckHintConfusion
Rule.description: User is confused. Give confusion feedback and turn to assertion.

Rule.name: FB2HintOtherwiseTutor
Rule.description: All other hint reponses. Turn to prompt.

Rule.name: FB2HintOtherwiseStudent
Rule.description: All other hint reponses. Turn to prompt.

Rule.name: NoMorePrompt
Rule.description: Try to find a good answer to the expectation when no more prompt is available.

Rule.name: TutorPrompt
Rule.description: Deliver tutor prompt.

Rule.name: FB2PromptGood
Rule.description: User's answer is good to the prompt. Give feedback and turn to assertion.

Rule.name: FB2PromptBad
Rule.description: User's prompt answer is bad, give feedback and turn to assertion.

Rule.name: FB2PromptOther
Rule.description: Any other prompt responses, give prompt answer and turn to assertion.

Rule.name: Assertion
Rule.description: Deliver assertion and get into another expectation.

Rule.name: Closing
Rule.description: Final closing

Rule.name: End
Rule.description: End the conversation

Item.text: _ComputerStudent_, 你可以重复一下刚才的问题吗？
_ComputerStudent_, 请重复一下刚才的问题。
_user_， 你看能不能回答下面这个问题。
_user_，我想你知道这个问题的答案。
如果你知道部分答案，也请你告诉我。
尽量告诉我你所知道的，这样我们好把你不知道的部分补上来。
你应该知道一些的。试试吧！
_user_, 你试试回答下面的问题。
不明白没关系，我们一起来弄清楚。
看来你没太明白这个问题。
你好像没太明白。没有关系。
有点糊涂了吧？没关系，我们接着讨论。
别跑题了，还是围绕我们的问题考虑。
好问题！可惜我不知道答案。
我记得我已经回答过了。
_user_, 我不明白这和我们的问题有什么关系。
_user_, 你看这个问题怎么回答。
这个话题对我太难了。 _user_，你能先回答这个问题吗？
_user_, 我不明白这和我们的问题有什么关系。
_user_, 你看这个问题怎么回答。
这个话题对我太难了。 _user_，你能先回答这个问题吗？
_user_, 我不明白这和我们的问题有什么关系。
_user_, 你看这个问题怎么回答。
这个话题对我太难了。 _user_，你能先回答这个问题吗？
我明白了！谢谢您的讲解！
老师，我在网上看到一副对联，觉得十分有趣。
它的上联是：若不撇开终是苦。
这是个析字联，把苦字中间的一短竖，写成一撇，就成了一个若字了。确实有趣。
可是我看到了不同的下联，觉得都挺好的。
下联是：各自捺住 就是名。
还有一个是各能捺住始成名。都可以吧？
都很妙，意思差别不大。不过从对联的平仄要求来看，前一个是错的，后一个才是对的。

Question.text: 同学， 你说说，为什么各自捺住就是名不对呢？

Answer.name: Ideal answer
Answer.text: 对联要求在每一句内偶数位置的字平仄相间，上下联偶数位置上的字平仄相对。这个对联的上联偶数位的字是不、开、是三个字，他们的声调分别是仄平仄。下联相对的位置应该是平、仄、平。自、住、是三个字是仄、仄、仄，所以是错的。能、住、成是平、仄、平，所以是对的。
Answer.keys: 仄平仄|仄、平、仄，仄仄仄|仄、仄、仄，平仄平|平、仄、平， 偶数，平仄相间|平仄错开，平仄相对

Expectation.text: 句内偶数位置的字平仄相间。

Answer.name: Expt1Good1
Answer.text: 对联要求每一句的偶数位置的字平仄相间。
Answer.keys: 偶数位，平仄相间|平仄错开

Hint.text: 在对联中，每一句内各字的平仄有什么要求呢?

Answer.name: Hint1Good1
Answer.text: 句内偶数位置的字要平仄相间。
Answer.keys: 偶数位，平仄相间|平仄错开

Answer.name: Hint1Good2
Answer.text: 应该平仄错开。
Answer.keys: 偶数位，平仄相间|平仄错开

Answer.name: Hint1Bad1
Answer.text: 应该平仄相同。
Answer.keys: 偶数位，平仄相同|平仄一样

Prompt.text: 每一句内偶数位置的字，要求平仄如何？

Answer.name: Prompt1Good1
Answer.text: 句内偶数位置的字要平仄相间。

Answer.name: PromptGood2
Answer.text: 平仄相间。

Answer.name: PromptBad1
Answer.text: 平仄相同。

Expectation.text: 联内两句偶数位置的字平仄相对。

Answer.name: Expt2Good1
Answer.text: 联内两句偶数位置的字平仄相对。

Hint.text: 在对联中，上下两句各字的平仄有什么要求呢?

Answer.name: Hint1Good1
Answer.text: 在对联中，上下两句偶数位置的字要平仄相对。

Answer.name: Hint1Good2
Answer.text: 上下两句偶数位置的字要平仄相对。

Answer.name: Hint1Bad1
Answer.text: 上下两句偶数位置的字要平仄相同。

Prompt.text: 在对联中，上下两句偶数位置的字平仄有什么要求?
Prompt.speech: The capacitor will charge when the signal begins to what?

Answer.name: Prompt1Good1
Answer.text: 上下两句偶数位置的字要平仄相对。

Answer.name: Prompt1Good2
Answer.text: 相对。

Answer.name: Prompt1Bad1
Answer.text: 相同。

Expectation.text: 这个例子中，上联偶数位置的字为：不、开、是，他们的声调是仄平仄。

Answer.name: Expt2Good1
Answer.text: 上联偶数位置的字为：不、开、是，他们的声调是仄平仄。

Hint.text: 在这个例子中，上联偶数位的声调是什么呢?

Answer.name: Hint1Good1
Answer.text: 他们的声调是仄平仄

Answer.name: Hint1Good2
Answer.text: 是仄平仄

Answer.name: Hint1Bad1
Answer.text: 是平平仄

Prompt.text: 这个例子中，上联的不、开、是三个字的声调是什么？

Answer.name: Prompt1Good1
Answer.text: 仄平仄。

Answer.name: Prompt1Good2
Answer.text: 仄平仄。

Answer.name: Prompt1Bad1
Answer.text: 仄仄仄。

Expectation.text: 这个例子中，下联偶数位置的字的声调应该是平仄平。

Answer.name: Expt2Good1
Answer.text: 下联偶数位置的字的声调应该是平仄平

Hint.text: 这个例子中，下联偶数位置的字的声调应该是什么呢？

Answer.name: Hint1Good1
Answer.text: 下联偶数位置的字的声调应该是平仄平。

Answer.name: Hint1Good2
Answer.text: 我想应该是下联偶数位置的字的声调应该是平仄平。

Answer.name: Hint1Bad1
Answer.text: 应该也是仄平仄。

Expectation.text: 在各自捺住便是名中，偶数位置的三个字是自住是，他们的声调是仄仄仄，句内没有相间，也没有和上联相对，所以是错的。

Answer.name: Expt2Good1
Answer.text: 在各自捺住就是名中，偶数位置的三个字是自住是，他们的声调是仄仄仄，句内没有相间，也没有和上联相对，所以是错的。
Answer.keys: 偶数位，没有平仄相间，没有和上联平仄相对

Hint.text: 各自捺住就是名有什么问题呢?

Answer.name: Hint1Good1
Answer.text: 在偶数位置上，句内没有平仄相间，也没有和上联平仄相对。
Answer.keys: 偶数位，没有平仄相间，没有和上联平仄相对

Answer.name: Hint1Good2
Answer.text: 在偶数位置上，句内平仄没有错开相间，也没有和上联平仄相对。
Answer.keys: 偶数位，没有平仄相间，没有和上联平仄相对

Answer.name: Hint1GBad1
Answer.text: 和上联平仄不一样。

Expectation.text: 在各能捺住始成名中，偶数位置的三个字是能住 成，他们的声调是平仄平，在句内声调相错，和上联的仄平仄一一相对，所以是对的。

Answer.name: Expt2Good1
Answer.text: 在各能捺住始成名中，偶数位置的三个字是 能 住 成，他们的声调是平仄平，在句内声调相错，和上联的仄平仄一一相对，所以是对的。
Answer.keys: 能住成|能、住、成，和上联平仄相对

Hint.text: 为什么说各能捺住始成名是对的呢?

Answer.name: Hint1Good1
Answer.text: 在各能捺住始成名中，偶数位置的三个字是能住 成，他们的声调是平仄平，在句内声调相错，和上联的仄平仄一一相对，所以是对的。
Answer.keys: 能住成|能、住、成，和上联平仄相对

Answer.name: Hint1Good2
Answer.text: 偶数位置的三个字是平仄平，在句内声调相错，和上联一一相对，所以是对的。
Answer.keys: 能住成|能、住、成，和上联平仄相对

Answer.name: Hint1Bad1
Answer.text: 偶数位置的三个字 声调不一样， 所以是对的。

ITEM.TITLE: Intoduction
ITEM.mattextS: 这是一个中文智能导学的例子。
